attributes.action: Credit reference agencys must provide information without charge
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned petition the goverment to remove the ability for credit reference agencys to be able to charge individuals for providing them with the information held about them.

We feel it should not be lawfull for a privatley held company to be able to charge an individual for the information held about them which will can adversly effect there livelyhood.
